Package se.cbb.jprime.math

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Continuous1DPD
    Interface for 1-D continuous probability distributions, i.e.
    Continuous1DPDDependent
    Union of Continuous1DPD and ProperDependent.
    ProbabilityDistribution
    Base interface for all probability distributions (continuous, discrete, composite, 1-D, 2-D, etc.).
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AdditionalEJMLOps
    Class with additional EJML operations not found in the current library at the time of writing.
    ChiSquared
    Not a chi^2 distribution per se; contains related functions however.
    Gamma
    Not a gamma distribution per se; instead contains convenience methods concerning gamma functions.
    GammaDistribution
    Represents a 1-D gamma distribution Gamma(k,theta).
    IntegerInterval
    Represents a 1-D integer valued interval of the type [a,b], (-inf,inf), etc.
    LogDouble
    Class for floating point numbers where the value is kept in log-form internally.
    Normal
    Not a normal (Gaussian) distribution per se; contains related functions however.
    NormalDistribution
    Represents a 1-D normal distribution, "Gaussian", N(m,v).
    PRNG
    Extension of a Mersenne twister pseudo-random number generator.
    RealInterval
    Represents a 1-D real valued interval of the type [a,b), (a,b], (-inf,inf), etc.
    ScaleTransformation
    Represents a scale factor k and offset m, e.g.
    TestChiSquared
    Unit test.
    TestGamma
    Unit test for Gamma.
    TestLogDouble
    Unit tests for LogDouble.
    TestNormalDistribution
    Unit test for NormalDistribution.
    TestUniformDistribution
    Unit test case.
    UniformDistribution
    Represents a 1-D continuous uniform distribution U(a,b).
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    IntegerInterval.Type
    Interval bound types.
    RealInterval.Type
    Interval bound types.
    ScaleTransformation.TransformationType
    Defines common relationships between a scaled parameter y and its unscaled form x when depending on scale factor k and offset m.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    MathException
    General purpose exception class for math-related issues such as (unimplemented) computations lacking closed-form expressions, probabilities having negative sign, etc.
